facts: Early detection increases survival rates dramatically for many cancers.
Over 30% of cancers are preventable through lifestyle changes.
Regular screenings can catch cancer before symptoms appear.
A healthy diet and physical activity reduce cancer risk significantly.
Avoiding tobacco is the single most effective way to prevent cancer.
Vaccines like HPV and Hepatitis B can reduce cancer risk.
Limiting alcohol consumption lowers cancer risk.
Sun protection reduces the risk of skin cancer by up to 60%.
Stress management and mental health support help patients recover better.

quotes.content: You never know how strong you are until being strong is your only choice.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.content: Hope is stronger than fear.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.content: Cancer is a word, not a sentence.
quotes.author: John Diamond

quotes.content: Your life is your story. Write well. Edit often.
quotes.author: Susan Statham

quotes.content: You beat cancer by how you live, why you live, and the manner in which you live.
quotes.author: Stuart Scott

quotes.content: You are stronger than the fear that tries to silence you.

quotes.content: Bravery doesn’t mean you never fear—it means you continue despite it.

tips: Maintain a balanced diet rich in fruits and vegetables.
Exercise at least 30 minutes every day.
Avoid processed foods and sugary drinks.
Protect your skin from UV exposure.
Get vaccinated for HPV & Hepatitis B.
Schedule annual health checkups and cancer screenings.
